description:
A union of strength and environmental consciousness. With anti-fatigue footbeds for people who spend long days on their feet, recycled materials, and soles built to last, these Timberland Original Boots are made with a long-term outlook.Full-grain leather upper is produced at a Leather Working Group’s (LWG) Silver-rated tannery.Laces are made from recycled plastic bottles.Breathable linings are made with 50% recycled plastic bottles.Removable footbeds provide all-day comfort and support.Durable outsoles are made with 15% recycled rubber.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
name: Timberland Original 6" Boots - Men's
